column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Best of the best!I loved this museum! We just so happened to be visiting Chicago the week after the new modern art wing opened. I was so excited to visit
column2: as I've always heard about the great art there. Unfortunately
column3: we chose to visit on our last day there so our feet were oh so tired from our previous adventures around the city. This
column5: but I was still able to enjoy on of my favorite Seraut works..Afternoon in the Park and a few Durer etchings..also a favorite artist of mine. We can't wait to go back and visit again...this time we will go here first!
